Comments_List: Significantly improved ability to translate German
An in depth study of German grammar for reading knowledge.
I think we need more work, unfortunately.
It is a lot of material to pack into a single semester.

We mostly covered things that were already in the textbook, and the textbook left a lot to be desired. We didn't drill the various grammar rules we learned, or go back over them. It was essentially expected that we would memorize the charts on our own.
Yes but I would say they need to work on the side, particularly if they don't know any German already
No. I would recommend that students take an intensive German course that is not "for reading".
